column1: Little Goat Diner////We then were suggested to try the Blueberry Pancakes and were told we were able to order a single pancake. So we had one of those
column2: and then a cinnamon roll. The pancake was served with a crumble on top and a buttermilk butter. The buttermilk butter is as dangerous as it sounds
column3: but you will definitely want to spread it on top.
